about.title: About Us
about.paragraph1: "Dragon's Palace" is the result of a ten-year journey of two friends through China. Lazar and Matija, culinary adventure enthusiasts, spent from 2005 to 2015 learning from Chinese master chefs.
about.paragraph2: Upon returning to Belgrade, they decided to share their experiences through authentic Chinese cuisine. Our restaurant combines traditional recipes from various Chinese provinces with fresh, local ingredients.
about.paragraph3: From Beijing to Sichuan, every dish in "Dragon's Palace" has its own story. Our chefs, trained directly by Lazar and Matija, carefully prepare each meal using authentic techniques and spices.
about.paragraph4: We invite you to experience the richness of Chinese cuisine in the heart of Jakovo. Whether you're a fan of spicy Sichuan dishes or prefer the subtle flavors of Cantonese cuisine, you'll find something to suit your taste with us.

chef.title: Meet the Chef
chef.tekst: Our chef is excellent, we all love this chef and he loves us a lot, he has been working for us for 20 years. Great chef.
